name: Against All Odds (LukeGLi, JonathanWang1234, Figueroa)
description:
SYNOPSIS:

Centuries ago, a tower rose from the Earth and speared the Moon in half.
Since then, many have tried, but none have succeeded, to climb the tower.
Today, a lone soldier enters the tower, ready to see what's at the top.

Fight epic bosses on your path to the top

-Slime King

-Smoky the... Bear?

-The Necromancer (coming soon)

-More???

Stay tuned

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Roll

Left Click - Attack (attack 3x times for a speed boost)

Left Click Hold & Release - Charge Attack

ESCAPE - Pause (while in game)
